description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows DWM core library (CVE-2024-30035):

1. Download and install the relevant KB updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

2. After installing the updates, restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- These updates resolve the identified vulnerabilities that could allow elevation of privilege on affected systems.
- Ensure that your system is updated to the specified build numbers to receive these updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your operating system matches one of the specified versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
